name: Semrush - Charts Library
description:
Intergalactic Design System is a constantly developing system of UI components, guidelines and UX patterns.


Main features of the library:

  • 12+ easy to use chart types.
  • Fully flexible components.
  • All components are carefully crafted with AutoLayout and Variants.
  • Almost all charts has links to guides and hints about usage.
  • Library has tutorial playground which will help you to know hacks and tips about using components âœ¨


---

We recommend you to use this library with our Core components and Icons libraries.
